name: Extremity Extravanganza at Sea Seminar
descr:
CANCELLED!
 
Registration for Extremity Extravaganza at Sea Seminar 2014
   
DATE: 11-13 April 2014
 
LOCATION: DFDS Seaways Crown Cruiseship between Oslo (Norway) and Copenhagen (Denmark).
 
DESCRIPTION:
 
EXTREMITY EXTRAVAGANZA
This course offers a very popular introductory overview of the seven extremities highlighting the anatomy, biomechanics, radiology, featuring Dr. Mally’s unique protocols and technique demonstrations. Attendees will participate in a hands-on workshop including several of Dr. Mally’s authentic "Sniper-Specific” specialized extremity adjusting techniques exemplified and supported by multidisciplinary research articles.
